summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 121, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Minor Avenue and Summit Avenue, from Madison Street to Marion Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9100 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
